title: About Aqui
subtitle: We are dedicated to connecting communities with vibrant, local street vendors through real-time, map-based technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Our mission is to empower local entrepreneurs by providing a platform that makes it easy for them to be discovered. We believe in the power of local economies and the unique cultural experiences that street vendors bring to our cities.
mission.paragraph2: We aim to bridge the gap between vendors and customers, making it simple, fun, and efficient to find and support businesses in your neighborhood.

whyWeBuilt.title: Why We Built This
whyWeBuilt.paragraph1: The idea for Aqui was born from a simple problem: the best local food is often hidden in plain sight. We were tired of missing out on amazing vendors simply because we didn't know where or when they'd be there.
whyWeBuilt.paragraph2: Traditional search and review apps don't work well for mobile businesses that change location daily. We saw an opportunity to create a dynamic, live map that reflects the real-time pulse of the streets.
whyWeBuilt.paragraph3: Aqui is for the food adventurers, the supporters of small business, and everyone who believes that the best discoveries are often just around the corner.

step1.title: Discover Live
step1.description: Vendors update their location in real-time on our live map.

step2.title: Explore Menus
step2.description: Browse offerings, photos, and business hours for nearby vendors.

step3.title: Get Directions
step3.description: Find your next favorite meal with a single tap for directions.

step4.title: Support Local
step4.description: Enjoy unique food and support the small businesses in your community.

difference.title: The Aqui Difference
difference.description: Unlike static directories, Aqui is a living platform. We focus exclusively on mobile and pop-up vendors, giving them the visibility they deserve and you the real-time information you need.
